title: Lunchbox Gets 2nd Psychic Reading…And It’s Not Much Better + Is Bobby Really Wearing Makeup At His Wedding? + Ben Rector Performs And Weights In On Band T-Shirt Debate
itunes:title: Lunchbox Gets 2nd Psychic Reading…And It’s Not Much Better + Is Bobby Really Wearing Makeup At His Wedding? + Ben Rector Performs And Weights In On Band T-Shirt Debate
description:
Lunchbox was freaking out after he got a psychic reading that told him not to make plans passed 2023. So he called another to get a 2nd opinion and we find out what they said about his fate. Bobby talks about A-Rod’s new line of makeup for men and whether or not he is still planning on wearing makeup to his wedding. Ben Rector stops by to perform and weighs in on the debate whether it’s okay or not to wear an artist’s t-shirt to their show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
